languages.text: "Молчать!" {n}Голос гиганта заставляет стены вздрогнуть.{/n} "Ваши скудоумные попытки оскорбить друг друга нарушают мою молитву Истинным Богам!"
"Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"
languages.original_text: "Молчать!" {n}Голос гиганта заставляет стены вздрогнуть.{/n} "Ваши скудоумные попытки оскорбить друг друга нарушают мою молитву Истинным Богам!"

traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: “闭嘴！”{n}巨人的声音让周围的墙壁都震颤起来。{/n}“你们这群蠢货！你们之间的骂战干扰了我对真神的祈祷！”
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴！”{n}巨人的声音让周围的墙壁都震颤起来。{/n}“你们这群蠢货！你们之间的骂战干扰了我对真神的祈祷！”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Le géant l'interrompt d'une voix si retentissante qu'elle fait trembler les murs.{/n} « Silence ! Votre tentative de repartie minable perturbe ma prière aux dieux véritables ! »
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le géant l'interrompt d'une voix si retentissante qu'elle fait trembler les murs.{/n} « Silence ! Votre tentative de repartie minable perturbe ma prière aux dieux véritables ! »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: 「黙れ！」{n}巨人の声が壁を揺らす。{/n}「お前たちが無分別に罵りあおうとしているせいで、真の神々への祈りに集中できぬぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ！」{n}巨人の声が壁を揺らす。{/n}「お前たちが無分別に罵りあおうとしているせいで、真の神々への祈りに集中できぬぞ！」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: «¡Silencio!». {n}La voz del gigante hace temblar la sala.{/n} «¡Vuestros insulsos intentos de insultaros están interrumpiendo mi plegaria a los Dioses Verdaderos!».
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Silencio!». {n}La voz del gigante hace temblar la sala.{/n} «¡Vuestros insulsos intentos de insultaros están interrumpiendo mi plegaria a los Dioses Verdaderos!».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Schweigt!" {n}Die Stimme des Riesen lässt die Wände beben.{/n} "Eure geistlosen Versuche, einander zu beleidigen, stören meine Gebete zu den Wahren Göttern!"
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt!" {n}Die Stimme des Riesen lässt die Wände beben.{/n} "Eure geistlosen Versuche, einander zu beleidigen, stören meine Gebete zu den Wahren Göttern!"
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: "Sessizlik!" {n}Devin sesi, duvarları sarsıyor.{/n} "Birbirinizi aşağılamak için gösterdiğiniz zekâ parıltısından yoksun çabalarınız, Gerçek Tanrılar'a ettiğim duaları bozuyor!"
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}The giant's voice shakes the walls.{/n} "Your witless attempts to insult one another are interrupting my prayer to the True Gods!"
